text: "I Forgot to Remember to Forget" is a 1955 song by Elvis Presley and was first to go to number 1 on the country charts. It was the fifth and final single to be released on Sun Records along with Mystery Train. ==The Beatles version== The Beatles covered in 1964 for their live album Live at the BBC. == References == Category:1955 songs Category:Country songs Category:Elvis Presley songs Category:The Beatles songs Category:Jerry Lee Lewis songs Category:Johnny Hallyday songs Category:Rockabilly songs
title: I Forgot to Remember to Forget
